Message.Title: Buffett and Yahoo
Message.Msg: Wasn't Mary Decker formerly of Yahoo on the BRK board? Or was she with another tech firm? Buffett says he is seeking a deal in the $20 billion plus range. Yhoo fits. plus Yhoo is a strong cash generator. Plus the Asian assets might appeal to Buffett as he is the ultimate patient money. He is no fan of tech... But in a way Yahoo has a decent moat as a news aggregator with first mover advantage in Yahoo Finance and Yahoo Sports. Maybe I am dreaming but then maybe so is Buffett.
